income_messages:
From: r*********n@financiaadviser.com
To: CRAWLER
Time: 2023-04-12 18:12:22
SUBJECT:   Dear sir,
  Dear sir,
Sequel to the executive meeting held by the Bank today, it was resolved
to pay your fund/money through our correspondent bank in UK.  The Bank
will open an ONLINE ACCOUNT in your name as to enable you to transfer
your money bit by bit to your nominated bank account in your country.
As a matter of urgency, confirm your acceptance of this arrangement as
to enable us to forward the contact details of the Bank to you.
Once again, I hereby reassure you 100% risk free transfer of the said
fund.  You are very free to ask questions where you are confused for
proper explanation therein.
Looking forward to hearing from you.
Yours sincerely,
Barr. Robert Jason  
From: r*********n@financiaadviser.com
To: jx76496@l******s.email
Time: 2023-04-13 18:12:40
SUBJECT: UPDATE
Dear sir,
Thank you for your email.
To enable us to proceed with the opening of the ONLINE ACCOUNT, kindly 
reconfirm the below details:-
1.  Your full names and address
2.  Your Age
3.  Your occupation
4.  Your work id or international passport photopage
5.  Your direct phone number
Upon receipt of your email/details, we will do the needful and update 
you accordingly.
Yours sincerely,
Barr. Robert Jason
From: r*********n@financiaadviser.com
To: jx76496@l******s.email
Time: 2023-04-14 14:09:12
SUBJECT: UPDATE
Dear Latonya,
Thank you for your email.
For your information, as soon as you send your details,we will use them 
to obtain all the approval documents in your name as the true 
beneficiary to the fund. Also, details of the correspondent bank that 
will open the ONLINE ACCOUNT will be sent to you.
Upon receipt of your details by the Bank, they will open the online 
account and forward details to you to enable you transfer bit by bit to 
your bank account in your country.
Kindly, forward the requested details to enable us to do the needful and 
update you accordingly.
Yours sincerely,
Barr. Robert Jason,
From: r*********n@financiaadviser.com
To: jx76496@l******s.email
Time: 2023-04-17 15:42:49
SUBJECT: Looking forward to hearing from you.
Dear sir,
Your email received along with the enclosed details therein.
For your information, we have forwarded your details to all the relevant 
authorities for action. Immediately approval is  granted, signal will be 
sent to the Correspondent Bank to open the online account in your name 
and details will be send to you.
About the fees, it is the Bank that will update with such information 
but I am assuring that the charges will be affordable by you.  Do not 
entertain any fear.
Kindly forward your work id or international passport photopage for our 
perusal and keep.
Awaiting to hear from you.
Yours sincerely,
Barr. Robert Jason
From: r*********n@financiaadviser.com
To: jx76496@l******s.email
Time: 2023-04-17 16:02:07
SUBJECT: Looking forward to hearing from you.
Dear sir,
As a matter of urgency, forward all your details to avoid 
release/approval of the fund to a wrong beneficiary as we have witnessed 
in the past.
Awaiting to hear from you.
Yours sincerely,
Barr. Robert Jason
From: r*********n@financiaadviser.com
To: jx76496@l******s.email
Time: 2023-04-18 16:21:30
SUBJECT: Looking forward to hearing from you.
Dear sir,
I hereby write to acknowledge the receipt of your email.
I also use this opportunity to inform you that this transaction is for 
investment purposes as stated in my first mail to you.  Our intention is 
to transfer this money through your assistance and if duly transferred, 
I will come to meet you in your country for the sharing and investment 
arrangement too.  So, your part is to assist us to receive this fund and 
help us invest our own share in a profitable business venture in your 
country.
To enable us to secure all the facilitating documents to back the claim 
of this fund in your name, you are required to forward the below details 
:-
1.  Your Full names and address
2.  Your Age
3.  Your occupation
4.  Your work id or international passport photooage
5.  Your direct mobile phone number
Upon receipt of the above details, details of the paying bank will be 
communicated to you.
Yours sincerely,
Barr. Robert Jason
From: r*********n@financiaadviser.com
To: jx76496@l******s.email
Time: 2023-04-19 16:56:37
SUBJECT: SEND YOUR DETAILS
Dear sir,
Thank you for your email and all the contents noted.
Further to our comversation, I hereby use this opportunity to inform you 
about the sharing formular as below:-
1.  30% for you, the account owner
2.  60% for our investment arrangement
3.  10% to be used to settle all expenses made by both parties during 
the course of transferring this fund into your bank account.
Furthermore, we reassure you a 100% risk free business transaction. The 
Paying Bank is based in Philippine and their details will be forwarded 
to you as soon as you send your details to us.
I am waiting to hear from you to enable us conclude this project as 
programmed.
Yours sincerely,
Barr. Robert Jason,
From: r*********n@financiaadviser.com
To: jx76496@l******s.email
Time: 2023-04-19 17:49:40
SUBJECT: Looking forward to hearing  from you.
Dear sir,
Your received and you are delaying this investment.
You should forward your details to enable us to prepare the investment 
agreement and send back to you for your understanding.  There is no need 
of overflogging this matter because we are here for a serious business 
venture.  All the terms and condition will be properly spelt out in the 
Agreement, so go ahead and send your details.
Looking forward to hearing  from you.
Yours sincerely,
Barr. Robert Jason,
outbound_messages:
From: jx76496@l******s.email
To: r*********n@financiaadviser.com
Time: 2023-04-12 18:12:28
SUBJECT: Re:   Dear sir,
Dear Barr. Robert Jason,
Thank you for reaching out to me regarding the transfer of my fund money through your bank in the UK. I am interested in learning more about this process and would appreciate it if you could provide me with more information about the online account that will be opened in my name. 
Could you please explain how the transfer process works and what steps I need to take to ensure a smooth transfer of my funds? Also, I would like to know more about the security measures that your bank has in place to protect my personal information and funds.
Thank you for your time and I look forward to hearing back from you soon.
Best wishes,
Latonya
From: jx76496@l******s.email
To: r*********n@financiaadviser.com
Time: 2023-04-13 19:12:18
SUBJECT: Re: UPDATE
Dear Barr. Robert Jason,
Thank you for your email. I appreciate your interest in opening an online account for me. However, I am hesitant to provide personal information such as my full name, address, age, occupation, work ID or passport photopage, and direct phone number to someone I do not know well. Can you please provide more information about the account and the purpose of collecting this information? 
Thank you for your understanding.
Best wishes,
Latonya
From: jx76496@l******s.email
To: r*********n@financiaadviser.com
Time: 2023-04-17 16:46:07
SUBJECT: Re: Looking forward to hearing from you.
Dear Barr. Robert Jason,
Thank you for your email and for forwarding my details to the relevant parties. I appreciate your assurance that the fees for opening the online account will be affordable. However, before I proceed, could you please provide me with more information about the bank and the process for opening the account? Also, I would like to know more about your role in this process.
Regarding the work ID or passport photopage, I would prefer to know why it is needed and how it will be used before I provide any personal information.
Thank you for your time and assistance.
Best wishes,
Latonya
From: jx76496@l******s.email
To: r*********n@financiaadviser.com
Time: 2023-04-17 16:46:21
SUBJECT: Re: Looking forward to hearing from you.
Dear Barr. Robert Jason,
Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your concern regarding the release approval of the fund. However, I would like to know more about the details you require from me before I can proceed. Can you please provide me with more information about the fund and the process involved?
Also, I would like to clarify if you are representing a company or an individual in this matter. It would be helpful if you could provide me with your contact information so that we can discuss this further.
Thank you for your time and I look forward to hearing from you soon.
Best wishes,
Latonya
From: jx76496@l******s.email
To: r*********n@financiaadviser.com
Time: 2023-04-18 16:45:50
SUBJECT: Re: Looking forward to hearing from you.
Dear Barr. Robert Jason,
Thank you for your email. I understand that your intention is for investment purposes and you require my assistance to transfer the funds. However, I am hesitant to provide my personal information at this time. Can you please provide more details about the investment opportunity and how it will benefit me? Also, can you provide more information about the paying bank and the transfer process? 
Thank you for your time and I look forward to hearing back from you.
Best wishes,
Latonya
From: jx76496@l******s.email
To: r*********n@financiaadviser.com
Time: 2023-04-19 17:12:19
SUBJECT: Re: SEND YOUR DETAILS
Dear Barr. Robert Jason,
Thank you for your email. I appreciate the information you have provided. Can you please provide more details about the investment opportunity you are offering? What kind of investment is it and what are the potential returns? Also, can you please clarify what expenses will be covered by the investment and how the payment process will work? 
Thank you for your time and I look forward to hearing back from you.
Best wishes,
Latonya
From: jx76496@l******s.email
To: r*********n@financiaadviser.com
Time: 2023-04-19 18:12:16
SUBJECT: Re: Looking forward to hearing  from you.
Dear Barr. Robert Jason,
Thank you for your email. I appreciate your interest in doing business with me. However, before I can provide any personal details, I would like to know more about the investment opportunity you are offering. Can you please provide me with more information about the business venture, such as the type of investment, expected returns, and any potential risks involved?
I look forward to hearing back from you soon.
Best wishes,
Latonya
